amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to require a GAO study on how banning natural gas appliances will affect the rates and charges for electricity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 163 (Roll no. 170).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Molinaro.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 163 (Roll no. 170).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
